problem: 如图,在△ABC中,AB=AC,D是BC上一点,且DE∥AC,交AB于E,DF∥AB,交AC于F,若四边形AEDF的周长为12cm,则等腰三角形ABC的腰长为()
answer: 解:∵DE∥AC,DF∥AB,∴四边形AEDF为平行四边形,∴DE=AF,AE=DF,∴C~四边形AEDF~=AE+ED+DF+FA=2(AE+ED)=12cm,∴AE+ED=6cm．∵AB=AC,∴∠B=∠C．∵DE∥AC,∴∠EDB=∠C=∠B,∴EB=ED,∴AB=AE+EB=AE+ED=6cm．故选:A．
comment: 本题考查了平行四边形的判定与性质、等腰三角形的判定与性质以及平行线的性质,根据等腰三角形的性质及平行四边形的性质找出EB=ED、AE+ED=6cm是解题的关键
problem_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = AC, D is a point on BC, and DE ∥ AC, intersects AB at E, DF ∥ AB, intersects AC at F. If the perimeter of quadrilateral AEDF is N_0, then the length of the waist of the isosceles triangle ABC is ()  ()
